name: Car Simulator 2[PC/CONTROLLER]
description:
This Is The Pc Ver Of CS2

Controls

Keyboard(NOT MENT FOR KEYBOARD)

Arrow Keys - Move

Controller

Left Stick - Walk

R2/RT - Throttle

L2/LT - Brake

Up Arrow - Phone

Left Arrow - Left Turn Signal

Right Arrow - Right Turn Signal

Triangle/Y(Hold While Colliding With Car) - Enter Cars

Triangle/Y - Exit Car

R1/RB - Cockpit Camera

Mobile

Door Button(Hold While Colliding With Car) - Enter Cars
